desc: Senpai, welcome to House Exams, please remember, only the girls in the same faction are able to attend the corresponding Exams. Now let's try it out!
Click here to start your exam~
Remember, there will be 60 stages for each House, and the difficulty for higher stages will increase gradually, but so will the rewards!
This is stage 1 for this Faction, you can challenge it by using 1 Admission Ticket! Senpai, show them what you got!
Senpai, welcome to House Exams, please remember, only the girls in the same faction are able to attend the corresponding Exams. Now let's try it out!
Click here to start your exam~
House Exams is separated into seasons, you will get Exam Scores for passing a Stage for the first time in the season.\nThe reward for passing stages will be increased as you reach higher stages!
This is stage 1 for this Faction, you can challenge it by using 1 Admission Ticket! Senpai, show them what you got!
